name: ReportCsf

constructors.name: ReportCsf
constructors.signature: public ReportCsf(String label, String description, Reports.FormulaType formulaType, Integer decimalPlaces, String downGroup, Reports.CsfGroupType downGroupType, String acrossGroup, Reports.CsfGroupType acrossGroupType, String formula)
constructors.description: Creates an instance of the Reports.ReportCsf class using the specified parameters.

params.name: formula
params.description: The user-facing name of the custom summary formula. The user-facing description of the custom summary formula. The format of the numbers in the custom summary formula. The number of decimal places to include in numbers. The name of a row grouping when the downGroupType is CUSTOM; null otherwise. Where to display the aggregate of the custom summary formula. The name of a column grouping when the accrossGroupType is CUSTOM; null otherwise. Where to display the aggregate of the custom summary formula. The operations performed on values in the custom summary formula.

constructors.name: ReportCsf
constructors.description: Creates an instance of the Reports.ReportCsf class. You can then set values by using the classâ€™s set methods.

methods.name: getAcrossGroup
methods.description: Returns the name of a column grouping when the acrossGroupType is CUSTOM. Otherwise, returns null.

methods.name: getAcrossGroupType
methods.description: Returns where to display the aggregate.

methods.name: getDecimalPlaces
methods.description: Returns the number of decimal places that numbers in the custom summary formula have.

methods.name: getDescription
methods.description: Returns the user-facing description of a custom summary formula.

methods.name: getDownGroup
methods.description: Returns the name of a row grouping when the downGroupType is CUSTOM. Otherwise, returns null.

methods.name: getDownGroupType
methods.description: Returns where to display the aggregate of the custom summary formula.

methods.name: getFormula
methods.description: Returns the operations performed on values in the custom summary formula.

methods.name: getFormulaType
methods.description: Returns the formula type.

methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Returns the user-facing name of the custom summary formula.

methods.name: setAcrossGroup
methods.description: Specifies the column for the across grouping.

methods.name: setAcrossGroupType
methods.description: Sets where to display the aggregate.

methods.name: setAcrossGroupType
methods.description: Sets where to display the aggregate.

methods.name: setDecimalPlaces
methods.description: Sets the number of decimal places in numbers.

methods.name: setDescription
methods.description: Sets the user-facing description of the custom summary formula.

methods.name: setDownGroup
methods.description: Sets the name of a row grouping when the downGroupType is CUSTOM.

methods.name: setDownGroupType
methods.description: Sets where to display the aggregate.

methods.name: setDownGroupType
methods.description: Sets where to display the aggregate.

methods.name: setFormula
methods.description: Sets the operations to perform on values in the custom summary formula.

methods.name: setFormulaType
methods.description: Sets the format of the numbers in the custom summary formula.

methods.name: setFormulaType
methods.description: Sets the format of numbers used in the custom summary formula.

methods.name: setLabel
methods.description: Sets the user-facing name of the custom summary formula.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string.

description: Contains methods and constructors for working with information about a custom summary formula (CSF).
